title: Report Tracker
description: I notice that many contractor companies still uses Excel or Google Sheets to track inspection report progress, which can be messy as the reports piling up. To simplify this process, I built a calendar-based report tracker app with a focus on being user-friendly and intuitive. As a result, an environmental company leveraged my app to better manage and track over 500 inspection reports.

title: Tune Snip
description: A full-stack web app designed to enhance music discovery and accessibility. Users can identify and search for songs while the app offers personalized recommendations.

title: Cosmic Crusaders
description: Collaborated with a team of 6 to develop a space shooting game with AI enemies. Players can explore the environment, shoot asteroids for loot, and purchase power-ups at the in-game shop.

title: Distributed File System
description: Implemented synchronous and asynchronous gRPC functions to manage file transfers between server and clients.
